metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of awesome adventures! We've got trains, farms, and even dinosaurs planned just for you. Let's get muddy!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's biggest city farm with llamas, sheep, and more! Enjoy a day of animal encounters and outdoor fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Mudchute has amazing animals and it's a DLR ride away!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Fun
activities.description: Visit pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens right in the heart of Hackney! Plus, enjoy a tasty treat at the cafe.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Meet friendly farm animals close to home!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore interactive exhibits and a dedicated under 5s play area at this design museum. Perfect for sparking creativity!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hands-on exhibits and a fun play area to explore!

transport.fromHackney: 26 bus or Central line to Bethnal Green, 20 mins

activities.title: Olympic Park Adventure
activities.description: Run, climb, and splash in the massive playgrounds of the Olympic Park! Tumbling Bay offers sand and water fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge playgrounds with climbing frames and water features!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for water play!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Immerse yourselves in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A world of imagination awaits!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dressing up and interactive stories will bring his favourite shows to life!

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character appearances!

activities.title: Victoria Park Adventure
activities.description: Explore two fantastic playgrounds, visit the deer enclosure, and enjoy a relaxing stroll around the boating lake.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Two playgrounds and the chance to spot deer!

transport.fromHackney: Homerton Overground or Mile End tube, 10 mins
transport.tube: Mile End (Central, District, Hammersmith & City lines)
transport.tip: Pack a picnic to enjoy by the lake!

activities.title: V&A East Storehouse Discovery
activities.description: Explore the visible storage displays at this brand new museum. See amazing objects up close!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A chance to see cool objects and explore a new museum!

transport.tip: Walk through Westfield for a fun shopping experience!

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: Roar with delight at the Dinosaur gallery, marvel at the Blue Whale, and explore the Wildlife Garden. A prehistoric adventure awaits!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: Follow the tunnel from the tube station for easy access.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Exploration
activities.description: Climb aboard vintage buses and trains, explore the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone. A transport enthusiast's dream!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can climb on real buses and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then Piccadilly line to Covent Garden, 40 mins
transport.tube: Covent Garden or Leicester Square (Piccadilly, Northern lines)
transport.tip: Check out the stamper trail for an interactive adventure!

activities.title: Science Museum Fun
activities.description: Explore The Garden (under 5s area), see the Flight gallery, and discover the Making the Modern World exhibit with TRAINS! Wonderlab is worth the extra cost.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Trains in the Making the Modern World gallery!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: The Garden is great for younger children.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs
activities.description: Visit the iconic Victorian dinosaur statues on the islands! Explore the farm, maze, and enjoy the great playground.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then Overground to Crystal Palace, 50 mins
transport.tip: Pack a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaurs.

activities.title: Thames Clipper Boat Ride to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a thrilling boat ride down the Thames to Greenwich! Enjoy the sights and fresh air from the back of the boat.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A real boat ride on the Thames!

transport.fromHackney: Bus to Liverpool Street, then tube to Tower Hill, 35 mins
transport.parking: Congestion charge zone near Tower Pier
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back for the best views!

activities.title: National Maritime Museum & Greenwich Playground
activities.description: Explore ships, play in the AHOY! children's gallery, and enjoy the great playground outside. A nautical adventure awaits!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Ships and a great playground near the river!

transport.fromHackney: Bus to Mile End, then District line to Cutty Sark DLR, 45 mins
transport.tip: Take the DLR for a fun train ride!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: Join Duggee and the Squirrels for a live show filled with singing, dancing, and badge-earning fun!

transport.tip: Check venue website for transport info

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience life-size dinosaur puppets in this thrilling and educational show. Get up close with a T-Rex!

transport.tip: Check venue website for transport info

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey and Bingo for a fun-filled theatrical adventure! Based on the popular TV show.

transport.tip: Check venue website for transport info

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance along with Peppa and her friends in this lively stage show!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Peppa Pig live on stage!

transport.tip: Check venue website for transport info

activities.title: Little Angel Theatre Puppet Show
activities.description: Enjoy a captivating puppet show at this specialist children's theatre. Intimate and magical!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A chance to see puppets come to life!

transport.fromHackney: Bus to Highbury & Islington, then walk, 30 mins
transport.tip: Book tickets in advance as it's a small venue.

activities.title: Zog at Polka Theatre
activities.description: Watch Julia Donaldson's Zog come to life on stage! After the show, play in the FREE adventure playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Based on a book by Julia Donaldson and a FREE adventure playground!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Clapham Junction, then train to Wimbledon, 1 hour
transport.tip: The playground is only open to theatre ticket holders.
